bug.short_desc: make corebird a bit more quiet in the log when network is off
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1238338 UserStream: silent warning when network is offline
Hi!
I noticed that corebird has a tendency to fill the log at a high rate with a warning message, when the network connectivity is offline :
Jan 1 17:12:39 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:40 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:41 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:42 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:43 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:44 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:45 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:46 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout... Jan 1 17:12:47 gandi-2 org.baedert.corebird: ** (corebird:23670): WARNING **: UserStream.vala:216: buf(fbellet) == NULL. Starting timeout...
Maybe we could replace this warning() statement with a debug() one ?

Done: https://github.com/baedert/corebird/commit/cc536e31e7e3f5b678541fc93fa5fb278976fb53
Unfortunately I didn't see that you attached a patch here and already pushed it myself, sorry :(
